items.sentence: I assume you know what happened here yesterday.
I can\'t believe you really want us to do this.
If we don\'t do something, Tom is going to die.
If you aren\'t busy, perhaps you could help me.
Tom has never lived anywhere other than Boston.
I\'m surprised that Tom didn\'t agree with you.
I\'m the only one here who can\'t speak French.
I think you\'ve been living in Boston too long.
I don\'t have the physical strength to do that.
Tom asked the waiter for another cup of coffee.
Tom banged his knees on the glass coffee table.
Tom became sick and spent time in a sanatorium.
Tom and Mary often wear the same color clothes.
Tom began teaching Mary French three years ago.
I don\'t think I can stop Tom from going there.
I don\'t think I know anyone who speaks French.
I\'ll definitely stay in Boston for a few days.
I\'ll do whatever it takes to feed my children.
Draft beer tastes especially good on a hot day.
If you see any mistakes, please send a message.
